author: Simon Difford
description: Coffee is often made with cardamom in Arab countries and this vodka-based coffee cocktail harnesses the aromatic eucalyptus and citrus notes in cardamom.
name: Turkish Coffee Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE cardamom pods in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
